content: of the yarn to make tassels or save the scraps for something else w stitches the pattern is written in us crochet terms click on the to wiatch a video tutorial for the corresponding stitch n abbr description magic_ring magic_ring e st/sts stitch/stitches double_crochet/dcs double_crochet s 1 stsc make 1 single_crochet and then stack 1 single_crochet on top of it tlo double_crochet third loop only double_crochet for this pattern the third loop is always on the front decrease decrease decrease over first and second st with stsc and tlo double_crochet 1 single_crochet in first st stack second single_crochet on top but don t pull through last loop tlo double_crochet in next st and pull through all loops to make the decrease ravelry instagram ©2023 thalia twine all rights reserved 2 symmetric triangle shawl stripes here stripes there instructions t h a l row 1 is a foundation row the stitch count increases by 1 in each row for the first half of the shawl i and decreases by 1 in the second half of the shawl instructions written in braces mean that all stitches within them are meant toabe made into the same st first half start with a magic_ring t row instructions st count 1 in magic_ring 3 dcs turn 3 w 2 in first st 1 stsc 1 double_crochet 1 tlo double_crochet in each st until 1 st before end double_crochet in last 4 st turn 3 1 stsc in first st 1 tlo double_crochet in each st until 1 st before end 2 dcs in last st turn 5 i repeat row 2 - 3 until you used up half of your yarn you do not have to end on a third row the n pattern also works if you end on a second row if you end on a third row continue with row 4 if you end on a second row continue with row 5 if you want an asymmetric shawl you can also just continue with row 2 and 3 until you reach the desired length e second half row instructions st count 4 decrease over first and second st with stsc and tlo double_crochet 1 tlo double_crochet in each st previous row - 1 until 1 st before end double_crochet in last st turn 5 1 stsc in first st 1 tlo double_crochet in each st until 2 sts before end decrease over last previous row - 1 two sts with 1 tlo double_crochet and 1 double_crochet turn repeat row 4 - 5 until you made the last row which should be 1 decrease and 1 double_crochet so 2 sts in total wet block your shawl weave in the ends with a tapestry needle ravelry instagram ©2023 thalia twine all rights reserved 3
